movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.

movies.title: Venom
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: The Wild Robot (2024)
movies.description: After a shipwreck, an intelligent robot called Roz is stranded on an uninhabited island. To survive the harsh environment, Roz bonds with the island's animals and cares for an orphaned baby goose.
